Package com.buffettinc.hrms.service.communication

Class MessageServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.buffettinc.hrms.service.communication.MessageServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageService
@Service @Transactional public class MessageServiceImpl extends Object implements MessageService
This class implements the MessageService interface and provides methods to manage messages between employees in the system.
